title: i had high MS and lose game, i'm unranked.
body: I'm unranked and playing rank to get high division. last 2 game because of this problem with high MS i lose 2 game. now i will get low division and i don't think that it is my problem and because of this problem i will get low division, why does riot did not made this games lost prevented ? does this problems is riots problem and not summoners?

replies.body: Loss prevention isn't something that we turn on whenever someone loses a game due to a bad connection at the time. We can try a couple things to see if we can get that ping to calm down a bit by updating your Port Forwarding and DNS settings which you can find in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Test those adjustments in a custom game really quick and let me know if that helps.
